thread.title: Harold Reynolds says Canadians don't play baseball, angers an entire country
thread.title_full: Harold Reynolds says Canadians don't play baseball, angers an entire country

author: Kristen Shilton
title: Harold Reynolds says Canadians don't play baseball, angers an entire country
text:
Harold Reynolds says Canadians don't play baseball, angers an entire country USA Today Sports 14 hrs ago Kristen Shilton ¬© USA Today Sports Harold Reynolds Baseball broadcaster Harold Reynolds has done the near impossible ‚Äì he‚Äôs managed to make Canadians very, very upset.
AdChoices During Sunday night‚Äôs broadcast on Fox Sports of Game 3 of the ALDS between the Toronto Blue Jays and Texas Rangers, Reynolds made the following quip about America‚Äôs neighbors to the North when discussing foul balls going into the crowd.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs not a lot of people who grew up playing baseball in Canada. They aren‚Äôt used to catching balls in the stands.‚Äù
Oh yes. He went there.
In case you want to listen to #HaroldReynolds insult an entire country & it's athletic skills, over and over again: https://t.co/2VzZea1N1c
‚Äî BarDown (@BarDown) October 12, 2015
As a born and bred Canadian, I can tell you we DO, in fact, grow up playing baseball. And guys like Fergie Jenkins, Larry Walker, Justin Morneau and Joey Votto, Canadians with Cy Young Awards and MVP titles to their names, are a testament to the kind of talent Canada has produced over the years.
Oh, and Canada also upset the powerhouse U.S. team 8-6 in the World Baseball Classic in 2006.
The Internet immediately took Reynolds to task for his ignorant remark, including Walker himself.
I won 7 gold gloves. I think part of winning them was cause I could catch. üòä
‚Äî Larry Walker (@Cdnmooselips33) October 12, 2015
So Harold Reynolds said b/c a sport isn't a vital part of a particular nation's culture, its citizens don't really know the game? üê∏‚òïÔ∏è
‚Äî Greg Wyshynski (@wyshynski) October 12, 2015
EH GUYS We should pull our Goalie and get an extra batter next inning !!!! #HaroldReynolds
‚Äî Paul W Bromby (@PaulBromby) October 12, 2015
I drop one foul ball in the camera bay and now Harold Reynolds thinks everyone from Canada is as bad as me.
‚Äî Barry Davis (@SNBarryDavis) October 12, 2015
I grew up in Canada and I don't have a TV in my igloo to watch the "baseball " what is the score ? #HaroldReynolds
‚Äî Paul W Bromby (@PaulBromby) October 12, 2015
Dear @FS1 , please ask #HaroldReynolds to explain how baseball works to Canadians-you know, the country where #BabeRuth got his 1st home run
‚Äî Kevin Frankish (@KevinFrankish) October 12, 2015
Good thing no one tried to tell him tomorrow is Thanksgiving in Canada. His head might well have exploded.
